doc:
Philippe Clair https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philippe_Clair 0 Philippe Clair (born 14 September 1930) is a French actor, director, producer, screenwriter, and popular humorist. Along with fellow French directors Max Pécas and Richard Balducci, his name is synonymous with the golden age of camp and low comedy in French cinema. Philippe_Clair ( born 14_September_1930 ) is a_French_actor , director , producer , screenwriter , and popular_humorist . Along with fellow_French_directors_Max_Pécas and Richard_Balducci , his_name is synonymous with the_golden_age of camp and low_comedy in French_cinema .
